Load necessary files and libaries.
```{r}
library(tidyverse)

header <- c( "chr", "start", "end", "count" )
dfA <- read_tsv("hg19-kc-count.bed", col_names = header)
dfB <- read_tsv("hg16-kc-count.bed", col_names = header)
df <- bind_rows(hg19=dfA, hg16=dfB, .id="assembly")
```
Plot kc counts across 1mb slices of hg19 per chromosome
```{r}
plt <- ggplot(df,aes(x=start,y=count,color=assembly)) +
  geom_line() +
  facet_wrap(vars(chr),5,6,scales="free")

ggsave("exercise2.png",width=10,height = 10)

plt

```
